about_the_game:
Alchemy of the Earth is set in an open world dreamscape where herbalism and alchemy are your only tools of survival. Gather ingredients, brew potions and poultices, find loot to survive the harsh nights and uncover the secrets of the island’s creator.

Find your way through the Veil:


Explore a large hand-crafted world with distinct environments and sweeping vistas. Traverse ruined settlements and overgrown wilderness, picking up pieces of history of the island as you go.

Pick every flower:


Alchemy of the Earth is the ultimate flower picking simulator. Navigate through dense forests and wide meadows with millions of harvestable ingredients, but don’t pick them all by hand, progress your character and discover unique ways to gather resources.

Grind ingredients, brew potions, distill magic:


With hundreds of distinct ingredients, items, poultices, and potions to discover the power of the elements is in your hands. Use your knowledge of aspects and essences to craft dozens of unique potions and spells.

Specialize your alchemist:


With every flower picked or potion brewed your character progresses farther. Level up your herbalism, craft, combat, chism, health and stamina skills naturally as you play, each with their own unique perks and gameplay advantages.

Survive:


Struggle to survive the creator’s failed experiments, sling potion bombs, cast spells, mix and match different combat effects to gain an edge on your enemy.

Full Narration and soundtrack:


Discover the story of Alchemy of the Earth through over 50 audio narrations and 40 minutes of original music.

content_descriptors.notes: Alchemy of the Earth contains visuals of skeletal human remains and narrative references to warfare, famine, and colonialism.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 2600X, Intel Core i7-6800K
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX 6800 XT, NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2080
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 24 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD Required

short_description: Explore the dreamscape of an Alchemist. Uncover his attempts to to bring back the dead. Survive in a doomed world, where the Alchemist's failed experiments linger behind, guarding his abandoned secrets.
